title: NATO Pushed Russia Into War, Experts Say
itunes:title: NATO Pushed Russia Into War, Experts Say
description:
Longtime foreign policy observers ranging from Noam Chomsky and Stephen Cohen to Pat Buchanan and Henry Kissinger have long warned that NATO actions would push Russia into a military response in Ukraine, and now that's precisely what's happened.

Plus a segment describing all the myriad ways neo-Nazi groups have infiltrated the Ukrainian government and military, and how neo-Nazi militias operate freely in wide swaths of the country.

Also featuring Stef Zamorano, Max Blumenthal and Mike MacRae! And phone calls from Liam Neeson and Joe Biden!
